attributes.action: Make the sale or use of a Sky Lantern in the UK illegal and a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: Sky Lanterns, where a fire is used to raise a structure into the air is dangerous to persons, property, animals and the envonment
attributes.background: Make the sale or use of a Sky Lantern in the UK illegal and a criminal offence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310556
